works.description:
The copyrighted text from our website WWW.STEROID.COM was stolen and INJECTED WITH ANCHOR LINKS to their affiliated site  WWW.iSTEROIDS.COM at the infringing URL's below.  Wouldn’t such a tactic easily boost their rankings with  GOOGLE?  Is there anyone I may discuss this situation with?  This blatant infringement also uses our content to directly compete with our paying affiliates.
